title: Small Standing Hippopotamus
period: Late Predynastic Period to Early Dynastic Period
description:
Small ivory standing hippopotamus. Eyes and ears in raised relief. Tail not indicated. Each pair of legs carved as single mass with central piercing seemingly for suspension of attachment to a support. 
Condition: Left side of face chipped, rear chipped. Some cracks on body.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
